name: Red Cross Code
body:
### Red Cross Code
Red Cross Code is an open partnership between American Red Cross chapters, the technology community, and open data enthusiasts to build new digital tools for preparing, responding, and recovering from disasters.

### Who We Are
* American Red Cross, Greater Chicago Region
    * Jim McGowan, Manager, Operations Analysis and Disaster Dispatch
* American Red Cross, Bay Area Chapter
    * John Laxson, Disaster Action Team Lead, San Francisco County

### Our Projects
